entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect value provided by DirectoryInfo.Attributes when directory does not exist #108345
  • There is no good way to tell if a service is added when using Keyed Services #108346
  • StreamReader.ReadAsync not honoring cancellation token #108342
  • [API Proposal]: ValidationResult constructor with a single member name #108338
    Future
  • Potential inconsistent MemoryCache stats #108333
  • Add key wrapping algorithms requested by Key Vault #108332
    10.0.0
  • Add post quantum algorithm support #108331
    10.0.0
  • Exporting Certificate with a password always chooses SHA1-3DES encryption #108330
  • [Regression] SIGSEGV on linux-arm64 self-contained trimmed single-file .NET 9 app #108327
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: The parameter is incorrect. #108322
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 SVE: Duplicating a scalar to a vector is non optimal #108321
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 SVE: Extended addressing modes are not used #108320
    10.0.0
  • STJ generator with external (generated) context class #108317
    Future
  • Unable to Install dotnetcore2 on macOS ARM64 (M1, M2, M3) Using Poetry #108316
  • Regex does not match, given a character-range from non-peripheral minus #108335
  • Test failure: GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd/dlbigleakthd.cmd #108308

Closed

  • Guid.Version does not return correct version in all situations #108267
  • Several BlockingCollection.TryTake inefficiencies #28426
  • Document HttpClient migration from HttpWebRequest/ServicePoint(Manager) #92690
    9.0.0
  • windows-arm64 release CrossAOT_Mono crossaot builds failing on Windows headers #106521
    10.0.0
  • Polymorphic JSON deserialization hangs indefinitely in native AOT since .NET 9 Preview 7 #108329
  • net9.0-ios regression causing `InvalidProgramException` in certain circumstances #108108
    9.0.0
  • How can I compile a Native AOT app with AddressSanitizer? #108315
  • 使用 SmtpClient 发送带有附件的邮件 有一定几率会触发“操作已超时”错误 #107128
  • Allow a single Span to have multiple underlying buffers "stiched" together as one #108313
  • .NET event counters from System.Runtime are not reported in some circumstances in .NET 9 RC 1 #107919
    10.0.0
  • VÍDEO Portal Zacarias Sabrina Saraiva Miss PPK Concurso #108310

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] fix guid version > 7 #108351
    needs-area-label
  • Trying to support changing member accessibility #108350
    area-EnC-mono
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108348
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Backport PR #108311 - Fix statics issue with barriers #108347
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the QCall contract for GC suppression. #108344
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [testing] Skip running R2Rdump in crossgen test targets so we can see… #108341
    NO-MERGE
  • [release/9.0] Enable policheck and tsa #108340
    needs-area-label
  • Test NuGet bug fix #108337
    needs-area-label
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • guard agains empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #108328
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • Wrap xunit's `WriteLine` methods in try catch. #108319
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Fix statics issue by using data dependencies #108309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • fix guid version > 7 #108314
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108266
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [release/9.0] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108218
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108244
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix build-runtime-tests-and-send-to-helix auth for internal PRs #107635
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Reduce funceval abort #108256
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix statics issue with barriers #108311
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable policheck and tsa #108312
    needs-area-label
  • [iOS] Enable and disable tests for hybrid globalization on Apple #108187
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Change ICU `WasmBuildTests` to use `wasmconsole` and `wasmbrowser` templates #108271
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Unblock System.Linq testing in nativeAOT outerloop #108302
    area-System.Linq
  • Remove HelperMethodFrame from `Delegate` construction #108217
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: refactor AddCodeDsc #108095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2548224 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert `ReflectionInvocation.CanValueSpecialCast()` to managed #108305
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/9.0] Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #108282
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [Swift interop] Add inline array struct lowering tests #107859
    area-Interop-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108283
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix SIMD class retrieval and type checks #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add runtime check for unwind get_proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
